      Overrides:

    • checkUserNamePassword

      private void checkUserNamePassword(String username, String password)
      This method is called from btnLogin's onClick listener. This method creates an onResponse method that will on a success, the provided username and password pair exists in the database, the user will be taken to the Dashboard activity with the account logged in. This method creates an onErrorResponse listener that will inform the user that username and password pair doesn't exist in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The user name of the account to be logged in to.
      password - The password of the account to be logged in to.
